notes: 书中提及“The shrine and an adjacent structure first appear on a map from 1938. The shrine is first identified as keramat without any further details in the 1939 survey in The Straits Times. It does not appear in any other surveys of keramat in Singapore until the late 1980s. It is first identified as "Keramat Sharifah Rogayah" in the Singapore Street Directory of 1988”（p225），此处最早被提及的时间采用其首先出现在地图上的时间。
